description: Describes the current email monitoring configuration for a specified organization.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The ID of the organization for which the email monitoring configuration is described.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM Role associated with the email monitoring configuration.

nested_items.name: LogGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch Log group associated with the email monitoring configuration.
